title: BONUS: And Just Like That Recap (with Naomi Ekperigin)
itunes:title: BONUS: And Just Like That Recap (with Naomi Ekperigin)
description:
In this special bonus episode of Everything Iconic, Danny and special guest/comedian Naomi Ekperigin dive in to the HBO series And Just Like That. 7 episodes have aired, and it's been a wild ride--kitchen fingers, wetting the bed, comedy concerts, Steve's decline, Charlotte's tennis, and so much more have already happened. Danny and Naomi discuss how far we've come, and what they think has worked and what hasn't. Danny also touches on The Way We Were, the 1970s classic with Barbra Streisand and Robert Redford!


Check out Naomi's new Netflix special The Standups, watch her on Mythic Quest on Apple and follow her on Instagram (@Blacktresscomedy)!


LINKS:
